name: Bases Loaded '96: Double Header
description: Bases Loaded '96: Double Header (known in Japan as Moero!! Pro Yakyuu '95: Double Header) is a 1995 sports video game released for the Sega Saturn and the Sony PlayStation. This game was the eighth and final game in the Bases Loaded series and the only one developed internally by Jaleco, after TOSE had developed the previous seven installments.
